meanings.definition: The act of not taking part in something.
meanings.sent1: Her nonparticipation in the school play disappointed her friends.
meanings.sent2: The nonparticipation of the team member affected the group project.
meanings.sent3: His nonparticipation in the dance class made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The garden's nonparticipation in blooming puzzled the gardener.
meanings.sent5: The nonparticipation of the shy student was noticeable to everyone.

meanings.sent1: The student's nonparticipation in the group project caused tension.
meanings.sent2: The nonparticipation of the audience made the event less enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: The cat's nonparticipation in catching the mouse was comical.
meanings.sent4: The clock's nonparticipation in ticking was concerning.
meanings.sent5: The nonparticipation of the athlete surprised the coach.
